name: Vacation Island
description:
Vacation Island is a short reverse-horror game, with a tiny open world to explore and dark secrets to uncover. The game is kind of a remake of a 2D game I made last year called "Paraciacum".

Made in 14 days for the 2022 Spring 32bits Jam.

FEATURES :

- A cute OST

- Time-Travel

- Adorable Animals

- Humans

- Light platforming gameplay

Textures by https://www.instagram.com/bluemintmilk/ 

All the rest by myself.

Please report if you spot any bug :)
